name: 2025 Porch View Dances
description:
Returning for its 14th year, embark on an unforgettable journey through Toronto's historic Seaton Village that is fun for the whole family. 

Explore the vibrant downtown neighbourhood, filled with thrilling performances and special guests at every turn. Celebrating the stories of Toronto's residents by taking dance out of the theatre and into our daily lives. Featured this year includes commissioned choreography by Toronto artists KINAJ, Pulga Muchochoma, Nicola Pantin, Diana Lopez Soto, and Mio Sakamoto.

name: Expressions of Light Art Exhibition

address.streetAddress: 399 The West Mall - Etobicoke Civic Centre

description:
Explore the wonders of watercolour painting and how it can express light, transparency and luminosity in landscape, waterscape and still life by artists from the Mississauga Watercolour Society.

Join the Artists for the opening reception on Sunday July 20, 2 to 4 p.m. Light refreshments provided.

name: Digital Impressions: Urban Griots Summer Program
description:
A hybrid collage making workshop exploring multi-layered personal storytelling for the future.
This program offers a vibrant exploration of local children, ages 7 to 12, and youth, ages 13 to 16, conveying and preserving stories about the Jane and Finch community through art and technology.

A City of Toronto Cultural Hotspot Signature Project
